src_original: bodhisatvo dāyakena dānapatinā vā lābhena pravāryamāṇo vā câlpêcchatāṃ darśayati /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩若有施主欲以財物而為供養，口示少欲而其內心甚願多取。

src_original: citte na spṛhām utpādayati /  antardāhâiṣa kulaputra yad vācâlpêcchatā cittena lābhakāmatā /
tgt_original: 善男子！ 此則名為內懷中熱——所謂口稱無貪，心實欲得。

src_original: na bodhisatvo dānapatiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ karoti /  vighāto me cīvareṇa /  vighāto me pātreṇa /  vighāto me glānabhaiṣajyena /  na ca taṃ dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ vā kiṃcit prārthayate /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩若見檀越，不作是相——示我衣鉢多有破壞、乏諸湯藥——現其闕少而以求施，口無所言。

src_original: na vācaṃ niścārayati /  evaṃ hi bodhisatvo nimittalābhâpagato bhavati /
yāvan na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvâivaṃ vācaṃ niścārayati /  amukenâmu-  [ Cambridge MS f117b ---> ]
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩若見檀越，不作是說： 『某甲檀越施我此物，我以恩德報答彼施。 』「不作此言：

src_original: kena vā me dānapatinâmukaṃ vastu pratipāditaṃ tasya ca mayâmukôpakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /  tena me śīlavān ayam iti kṛtvêdaṃ cêdaṃ ca dattaṃ bahuśrutêti /  mayā ca tasya kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya parigṛhītaṃ /
tgt_original: 『令前施主知我持戒、知我多聞、知我少欲，我以慈悲受彼嚫施。 』不作抑揚方便皷動。

src_original: tatra kāyakṣatir yad uta lābhahetor lābhanidānam ādhāvanaparidhāvanaṃ dauḥśīlyasamudācaraṇaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 言身瘡者，為財物故不憚劬勞、四方役身、疾急怱務、違於戒律；

src_original: cittakṣatir yad uta prārthanā /  lābhināṃ ca brahmacāriṇām antike vyāpādabahulatā /
tgt_original: 言心瘡者，於諸同學減利養者多生嫉妬。

src_original: pe //  iha bodhisatvo na tulākūṭena na mānakūṭena na visraṃbhaghātikayā na dhūrtatayā lābham upārjayati /
tgt_original: 不以輕稱小斗欺誑於人、不以詐親及諸欺罔而求財物。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo 'dharmalābhâpagato bhavati / pe /  ye te lābhā staupikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā dhārmikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā sāṃghikasaṃsṛṣṭā vâdattā vânanujñātā vā /
